Title (EN): How would your life change by losing weight?
Title (ES): ¿Cómo cambiaría tu vida al perder peso?
Subtitle (EN): Select all that apply.

Title (EN): Do you have a specific weight loss medication in mind?
Title (ES): ¿Tienes en mente algún medicamento específico para perder peso?

Title (EN): You've got it. We'll begin with some questions about you.
Title (ES): Lo tienes. Comenzaremos con algunas preguntas sobre ti.
Subtitle (EN): After that, we'll dive into your health history...

Title (EN): This questionnaire helps us understand your medical history, lifestyle, and goals.
Title (ES): Este cuestionario nos ayuda a entender tu historial médico, estilo de vida y objetivos.
Subtitle (EN): Similar to the form you fill out when you visit the doctor.

Title (EN): Select the state you live in:
Title (ES): Selecciona el estado en el que vives:
Subtitle (EN): This state is where your medication will be shipped to.

Title (EN): What is your name?
Title (ES): ¿Cuál es tu nombre?
Subtitle (EN): This way, we can personalize your experience.

Title (EN): To check if you qualify, tell us your date of birth.
Title (ES): Para verificar si calificas, dinos tu fecha de nacimiento.
Subtitle (EN): This helps us confirm age requirements.

Title (EN): Sex assigned at birth
Title (ES): Sexo asignado al nacer
Subtitle (EN): This medical information helps us properly assess your eligibility.

Title (EN): How can we contact you?
Title (ES): ¿Cómo podemos contactarte?

Title (EN): Did you know?
Title (ES): ¿Sabías que?
Subtitle (EN): Assigns a representative to your case...

Title (EN): What's your shipping address?
Title (ES): ¿Cuál es tu dirección de envío?
Subtitle (EN): All treatment medications are shipped to your door.

Title (EN): What's your ideal weight?
Title (ES): ¿Cuál es tu peso ideal?
Subtitle (EN): This isn't a binding contract—think of it as your long-term target.

Title (EN): What's your current weight?
Title (ES): ¿Cuál es tu peso actual?
Subtitle (EN): Just an estimate is fine. We'll use this to calculate your BMI.

Title (EN): One moment
Title (ES): Un momento

Title (EN): Based on the information you shared, the use of medication may be appropriate for you.
Title (ES): Según la información que compartiste, el uso de medicamentos puede ser apropiado para ti.
Options/Fields: Shows BMI, weight loss potential, goal weight

Title (EN): Join the thousands of transformations we've helped achieve.
Title (ES): Únete a los miles de transformaciones que hemos ayudado a lograr.
Subtitle (EN): Each of these cases features real patients.

Title (EN): Now let's review your medical history.
Title (ES): Ahora revisemos tu historial médico.

Title (EN): Are you currently pregnant, breastfeeding, or planning to become pregnant in the next 6 months?
Title (ES): ¿Estás actualmente embarazada, amamantando o planeas quedar embarazada en los próximos 6 meses?

Title (EN): What is your usual level of daily physical activity?
Title (ES): ¿Cuál es tu nivel habitual de actividad física diaria?

Title (EN): Have you been diagnosed with any of the following mental health conditions?
Title (ES): ¿Has sido diagnosticado con alguna de las siguientes condiciones de salud mental?
Subtitle (EN): We ask this because some conditions may influence treatment.

Title (EN): Have you been diagnosed with any of the following?
Title (ES): ¿Has sido diagnosticado con alguno de los siguientes?
Subtitle (EN): Some conditions may influence treatment type.
Options/Fields: none, depression, bipolar, bpd, panic, schizophrenia, psychosis

Title (EN): All our programs include
Title (ES): Todos nuestros programas incluyen

Title (EN): Do you have any medical conditions or chronic diseases?
Title (ES): ¿Tienes alguna condición médica o enfermedad crónica?

Title (EN): What type of chronic condition or disease do you have?
Title (ES): ¿Qué tipo de condición o enfermedad crónica padeces?

Title (EN): Do you have any of the following stomach or digestive conditions?
Title (ES): ¿Tienes alguna de las siguientes condiciones estomacales o digestivas?
Options/Fields: ibs, celiac, constipation, heartburn, gastroparesis, ulcer, crohns, colitis, diverticulitis, none

Title (EN): Do you have any history of kidney problems?
Title (ES): ¿Tienes algún historial de problemas renales?

Title (EN): Have you had any abdominal, intestinal, or weight-loss surgeries?
Title (ES): ¿Has tenido alguna cirugía abdominal, intestinal o de pérdida de peso?

Title (EN): Have you had any surgery or medical procedure?
Title (ES): ¿Ha tenido alguna cirugía o procedimiento médico?
Options/Fields: gastric_bypass, duodenal_switch, lap_band, gastric_sleeve, intestinal_surgery, none

Title (EN): What's your most recent blood pressure reading?
Title (ES): ¿Cuál es tu lectura de presión arterial más reciente?
Subtitle (EN): If you don't know exact numbers, select your best estimate.
Options/Fields: normal, elevated, high_stage1, high_stage2, crisis, low, unknown

Title (EN): Do you currently take or have you ever taken a GLP-1 medication for weight loss?
Title (ES): ¿Actualmente toma o ha tomado alguna vez un medicamento GLP-1 para perder peso?
Subtitle (EN): GLP-1s include semaglutide, tirzepatide, Ozempic, Wegovy, Mounjaro, Zepbound

Title (EN): Which GLP-1 medication did you take or are you currently taking?
Title (ES): ¿Qué medicamento GLP-1 tomaste o estás tomando actualmente?

Title (EN): What dose of injectable semaglutide (Ozempic®, Wegovy® or compounded) are you taking?
Title (ES): ¿Qué dosis de semaglutida inyectable está tomando?
Subtitle (EN): Indicate your current dose in milligrams (mg) per week.

Title (EN): Have you experienced any side effects while taking semaglutide?
Title (ES): ¿Has experimentado algún efecto secundario mientras tomas semaglutida?
Options/Fields: nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, constipation, headache, fatigue, none

Title (EN): How successful has your experience been with semaglutide?
Title (ES): ¿Qué tan exitosa ha sido su experiencia con semaglutide?

Title (EN): What dose of injectable tirzepatide (Mounjaro®, Zepbound® or compounded) are you taking?
Title (ES): ¿Qué dosis de tirzepatida inyectable está tomando?
Subtitle (EN): Indicate your current dose in milligrams (mg) per week.

Title (EN): Have you experienced any side effects while taking tirzepatide?
Title (ES): ¿Has experimentado algún efecto secundario mientras tomas tirzepatida?
Options/Fields: nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, constipation, headache, fatigue, none

Title (EN): How successful has your experience been with tirzepatide?
Title (ES): ¿Qué tan exitosa ha sido su experiencia con tirzepatide?

Title (EN): Are you satisfied with your current GLP-1 dose?
Title (ES): ¿Está satisfecho con su dosis actual de GLP-1?

Title (EN): How often do you have 5 or more alcoholic drinks on a single occasion?
Title (ES): ¿Con qué frecuencia tomas 5 o más bebidas alcohólicas en una sola ocasión?
Subtitle (EN): Alcohol can sometimes interfere with certain medications.

Title (EN): Have you taken any of the following recreational drugs in the past 6 months?
Title (ES): ¿Has tomado alguna de las siguientes drogas recreativas en los últimos 6 meses?
Subtitle (EN): We ask this so your provider can have a complete picture.
Options/Fields: cocaine, kratom, opiates, meth, cannabis, none

Title (EN): Have you ever tried to lose weight before?
Title (ES): ¿Has intentado perder peso antes?
Options/Fields: diet, exercise, supplements, programs, surgery, medication, none

Title (EN): What would make it easier for you to stick with a weight loss program?
Title (ES): ¿Qué haría más fácil para ti mantenerte en un programa de pérdida de peso?
Subtitle (EN): Select all that apply.
Options/Fields: nutrition, meals, digital, dosage, community, other

Title (EN): Nausea, vomiting, constipation, and diarrhea are common early side effects of weight loss medication.
Title (ES): Las náuseas, vómitos, estreñimiento y diarrea son efectos secundarios tempranos comunes.

Title (EN): Would you be interested in your provider considering a personalized dosage plan?
Title (ES): ¿Estarías interesado en que tu proveedor considere un plan de dosis personalizado?

Title (EN): Clinical data indicates that personalized GLP-1 dosing can help reduce side effects.
Title (ES): Datos clínicos indican que las dosis personalizadas de GLP-1 pueden ayudar a reducir los efectos secundarios.

Title (EN): Committed to safety and the highest quality at every step.
Title (ES): Comprometidos con la seguridad y la máxima calidad en cada paso.
Options/Fields: FDA, Licensed Pharmacy, Personalized Treatments icons

Title (EN): Meet Your Medical Team
Title (ES): Conoce a Tu Equipo Médico

Title (EN): Do you usually experience any of these side effects when starting a new medication?
Title (ES): ¿Sueles presentar alguno de estos efectos secundarios al comenzar un nuevo medicamento?
Subtitle (EN): Our doctors can help you manage side effects.
Options/Fields: gastrointestinal, abdominal_pain, appetite_decrease, fatigue, dizziness, headache, none

Title (EN): Your personalized treatment awaits.
Title (ES): Tu tratamiento personalizado te espera.

Title (EN): Finding a licensed provider
Title (ES): Buscando un proveedor licenciado

Title (EN): Great news!
Title (ES): ¡Excelentes noticias!
Subtitle (EN): You may qualify for treatment.
